name: Limber
description:
Our protagonist, in an eternal quest for love and understanding, is defenestrated; his limbs violently severed and thrown free of the dumpster into which he is cast. The orphaned limbs must undertake a treacherous journey to reunite with their body before our protagonist can continue spreading his message of peace and love.

Click to move. Click on a limb to take control of it.

Art by Lizzy John.

Submitted for Monster Mash 2014.
